sg.game.bossbar.chest_loot: Please wait while loot is generated...
sg.game.deathmatch.begin: The border has stopped shrinking! The game will end in %s seconds.
sg.game.border.shrink: The border has begun to shrink!
sg.game.combat.punish: %s tried to combat log and was punished for it!
sg.game.title.subtitle: Your position:
sg.game.end.time: Times up! The game has ended in a draw.
sg.game.end.unexpected: The game was prematurely ended. All players have been returned to the lobby.
sg.game.pvp_grace.end: The grace period has expired! PvP is now enabled!
sg.game.oob.title: Out of Bounds
sg.game.oob.subtitle: Please return to play area
sg.game.begin: The barriers have dropped! A %s second grace period has been applied!
sg.game.grace_period.expire_soon: The grace period has %s seconds remaining!
sg.game.spectator.overflow: Maximum player count has been reached, you were automatically moved to the spectators.
sg.game.item.library_key.name: Library Key
sg.lobby.start.begin: Start countdown has begun! Game will begin in %s seconds.
sg.lobby.start.warn.min_players: Warning! Only 1 player detected! Cancel the countdown now if you wish to have more players!
sg.lobby.start.warn.max_players: Warning! Maximum number of players is %s! Excess players will be forced to spectate!
sg.lobby.start.error.no_players: At least one player must be ready before starting the game!
sg.lobby.teams.random: You will be assigned a random team at the start of the match!
sg.lobby.teams.full: That team is full! Please choose a different team to join.
sg.lobby.teams.countdown_in_progress: Start countdown is in progress! You cannot change teams at this time.
sg.lobby.teams.already_on_team: You are already on that team!
sg.lobby.teams.item.team.name: %s's Team
sg.lobby.teams.item.team.lore: Click here to join the team
sg.lobby.teams.item.ready.name: READY
sg.lobby.teams.item.ready.lore: Indicates that you are ready to start the game
sg.lobby.teams.item.spectator.name: SPECTATOR
sg.lobby.teams.item.spectator.lore: Indicates that you wish to spectate the upcoming match
sg.lobby.teams.item.new.name: NEW TEAM
sg.lobby.teams.item.random.name: RANDOM
sg.lobby.teams.item.random.lore: Assigns you a random team when the game begins
sg.lobby.teams.disband.leader_leave: Your team was disbanded because the leader has left.
sg.lobby.teams.disband.size_changed: Your team was disbanded because the team options were changed.
sg.lobby.arena.sword.name: Training Sword
sg.lobby.teleporter.name: Personal Teleporter
sg.lobby.teleporter.lore: Returns you to your current respawn position
sg.lobby.options.display.start_game.name: Start Game
sg.lobby.options.display.anticheat.name: Anti-Cheat
sg.lobby.options.display.loot_type.name: Equipment Spawning
sg.lobby.options.display.reset.name: Reset Options
sg.lobby.options.actions.lock.lock: Game options have been locked! Only you and/or admins can modify them.
sg.lobby.options.actions.lock.auto_unloc: The game options have automatically been unlocked because there are no admins online.
sg.lobby.options.actions.lock.grant_perm: You may now edit the game options!
sg.lobby.options.actions.lock.unlock: All players may now edit the game options.
sg.lobby.options.actions.lock.no_permiss: You do not have permission to edit the game options at this time. %s to give yourself permission.
sg.lobby.options.actions.reset: All options have been reset to their default values.
sg.lobby.options.actions.edit: Use the command %s to enter a custom value!
sg.lobby.options.actions.music.error.no_: There are no other music selections available at this time.
sg.lobby.options.actions.help.border_del: Number of seconds the border will wait at the initial size before starting to shrink.
sg.lobby.options.actions.help.border_shr: The amount of time the border will take to shrink to its minimum size, measured in seconds.
sg.lobby.options.actions.help.border_sta: The size, measured in blocks, that the border will start at. Use the map on the floor of the center room for a visual representation of the current border size.
sg.lobby.options.actions.help.chest_rest: What type of chests should be restocked in the middle of the game: All, Cornucopia, or None.
The amount of time before chests will be restocked during a game, measured in seconds.
sg.lobby.options.actions.help.grace_peri: The amount of time that PvP is disabled for at the start of the game, measured in seconds.
sg.lobby.options.actions.help.loot_type: Controls whether or not chests can spawn with crafted items.
sg.lobby.options.actions.help.max_team_s: Maximum number of players allowed on a single team.
sg.lobby.options.actions.help.anticheat:
Detects and punishes players who are found to be cheating. Current cheats that can be detected:
• Combat logging
sg.lobby.credits.translation.thanks: Special thanks to everyone who helped translate this map!
sg.lobby.credits.translation.contact: • Contact us on Discord or Planet Minecraft if you wish to help us translate!
sg.admin.chest.error.restock_in_progress: New restock cannot be started, another one is already in progress.
sg.admin.chest.error.set_loot_failed: Set loot table has failed at %s!
sg.admin.dev.uninstall: SG Development pack has been uninstalled.
sg.admin.dev.unavailable: You can't do that right now!
sg.general.safety.bypass.allow: You have been given a safety exemption.
sg.general.safety.bypass.revoke: You have had your safety exemption revoked.
sg.general.safety.bypass.warning1: WARNING! These safety checks protect the game from entering an invalid state. By ignoring them, the game will not function as intended. %s to re-enable the safety checks.
sg.general.safety.survival1: This map is not designed to be played in survival mode, so you have automatically been placed into adventure mode. To disable this behavior, use %s
sg.general.safety.respawn1: You have already died during this round, and cannot be brought back to life. To override this feature and allow respawns, use %s
sg.general.safety.playercap.on: The maximum player count has been set to %s.
sg.general.safety.playercap.off: The maximum player count will no longer be enforced.
sg.general.safety.playercap.warning1: WARNING! This map is not balanced for more than %s players. Large lobbies are not recommended. %s to re-enable the default limit.
sgdev.chests.modify: Rarity for chest at %s has been set to %s
sgdev.chests.error.no_modify: No chest to modify at this location!
sgdev.chests.error.wait_modify: Please wait before modifying more chests...
sgdev.chests.error.wait_place: Please wait before placing down more chests...
sgdev.glow.please_wait: Please wait for the current operation to finish!
sgdev.glow.finish.place: Glowing chests have been set! Operation completed in %s ticks
sgdev.glow.finish.remove: Glowing chests have been removed! Operation completed in %s ticks
sgdev.loot.title: Simulating player loot with the following chest quantities:
block.minecraft.brown_glazed_terracotta: Greeble Block (N), Dance Floor Block (E), Vibrant Cyan Terracotta (S)
